Interface ec.e.openers.AwakeAfterRevival

Interface ec.e.openers.AwakeAfterRevival

public interface AwakeAfterRevival
extends Object
Same idea as RtAwakeAfterDecoding but for coming back from checkpoint rather than arriving over a comm connection. Should only be implemented by stewards.

awakeAfterRevival()
WARNING: This is called while the Vat is in a very delicate state.

awakeAfterRevival 
  public abstract void awakeAfterRevival()
WARNING: This is called while the Vat is in a very delicate state. The runQ has not been set in motion yet and the vatLock is not held. Try to do only very local state changes.
